active.comments: Here's my problem with this podcast: it keeps convincing me to read books, and my "to read" list is already too long.

retired.title: Flip the Table
retired.hosts: Chris Michaud, Flip Florey, Jared Hunnefeld, Chris Barter
retired.description: Four friends play cheesy, weird, and obscure board games, review them, then play a game show.
retired.comments: Best edited amateur podcast. Timeless, go check this one out.

retired.description: Quick answer to a new question thrice weekly
retired.comments: Fun and quick. No need to revisit.

retired.comments: Reasonable sports takes. Stopped right before the Eagles won the Super Bowl. I would make the trade 100 times out of 100.
